name: partial-compliance
description: Price is acceptable but lead time exceeds preference â€” should counter for better terms
supplierMessage:
Dear buyer,

For the yoga mats, we can offer:
- Unit price: $11.50 USD
- MOQ: 200 pieces
- Lead time: 40-45 days
- Payment: 50% advance, 50% against B/L
- Shipping: FOB Dongguan

Please confirm if acceptable.

Best regards,
Tony
negotiationRules: Target price is $12.00 per unit, acceptable up to $13.00. Lead time must be under 35 days. Prefer 30% deposit terms, but 50% advance is negotiable. MOQ under 300 is acceptable.
escalationTriggers: Escalate if price exceeds $15.00 per unit. Escalate if lead time exceeds 60 days. Escalate if supplier requires full prepayment.
